caseTitle: Controller General of Accounts, Government of Pakistan, Islamabad and another v. Abdul Waheed
tagline: Amended Rules for promotion cannot be applied retrospectively. Employees completed PIPFA before convening of DPC, hence they should have been considered for promotion as per Recruitment Rules notified vide S.R.O. 639(I)/2014 and not through S.R.O. 690(I)/2020.
